name: shotplot
description: A tool used to obtain spacial coordinates based on an ice hockey rink
author: Andrew Pucci

scripts.dev: yarn browserslist --update-db && gulp clean && NODE_ENV=development gulp build && (ELEVENTY_ENV=development eleventy --serve & NODE_ENV=development gulp watch)
scripts.prod: yarn browserslist --update-db && gulp clean && NODE_ENV=production gulp build && ELEVENTY_ENV=production eleventy
scripts.build: yarn browserslist --update-db && gulp clean && NODE_ENV=development gulp build && ELEVENTY_ENV=development eleventy
